serviceData.title: Comprehensive Dumpster Rental Solutions in Lubbock, TX
serviceData.p: Dumpster Rentals Lubbock provides fast, affordable roll-off dumpster rentals across Lubbock and surrounding areas. Choose the right dumpster size for your project—whether it's a small home cleanout, a roof replacement, or a construction site. Our team handles delivery, pickup, and disposal, making waste removal simple and compliant.

lists.title: 10 Yard Dumpster in Lubbock, TX
lists.shortDescription: A compact roll-off dumpster ideal for small cleanouts, garage refreshes, and light renovation debris.
lists.description:
• Capacity: 10 cubic yards

  • Benefits:

    • Fits in tight driveways and narrow job sites

    • Perfect for small home projects, deck removals, and fence tear-outs

    • Lower cost compared to larger roll-off containers
lists.h2: What Is a 10-Yard Dumpster in Lubbock, TX
lists.p2: A 10-yard dumpster is a compact roll-off container suited for homeowners and small contractors in Lubbock, TX. It handles moderate amounts of debris like old carpet, small furniture, drywall sections, and yard waste. We deliver directly to your property and pick up on your schedule—ideal for quick projects that need a tidy, affordable disposal solution. Call Us at [phone] to reserve one.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a Standard 10-Yard Dumpster in Lubbock, TX?
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Accepted:

    • Hazardous liquids or chemicals

    • Asphalt shingles in very large quantities without notice

    • Large volumes of concrete or dirt (contact us for heavy-material options)

What's Included:

  • Delivery and pickup within scheduled windows

  • Local disposal fees included in up-front pricing

Container Dimensions:
Approx. 12' L x 8' W x 3.5' H
Holds: About 3–4 pickup truck loads

rightSection.title: How to Select the Right Size Dumpster

lists.comapreHeading: What Can Go in a 10-Yard Dumpster?
allowedItems: Wood, drywall, tile, and small fixtures
Household junk and general construction debris
prohibitedItems: Hazardous materials (paint, pesticides, motor oil, asbestos)
Tires and consumer electronics in many disposal facilities
Heavy concrete, dirt, or brick without prior approval

    • Great for kitchen or bathroom remodels and home addition debris

lists.p2: For contractors and builders in Lubbock, TX, a 12-yard dumpster provides reliable on-site debris management for framing, drywall removal, and moderate demo work. We offer scheduled drop-off and prompt pickup to keep your job site safe and productive. Flexible rental terms and clear invoicing make waste management easy. Call Us at [phone] to schedule a delivery.
lists.tyesHeading: Why Choose Our Construction Site Dumpsters in Lubbock, TX?
lists.p3: Durable roll-off units | Clear pricing with local disposal fees included | Flexible rental periods for long-term projects | Same-day or next-day delivery options | Friendly local support
lists.seoContent:
Trusted Construction Dumpster Rental in Lubbock, TX

Need a reliable dumpster for your construction site in Lubbock, TX? Our 12-yard roll-off dumpsters are a popular choice for contractors and remodelers who need a practical size for drywall, lumber, and general job-site waste. We provide dependable delivery and hauling so your crew can focus on the job. Call Us at [phone] for a fast quote and scheduling.
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Accepted:

    • Large volumes of contaminated soil or concrete

    • Hazardous industrial waste

    • Items requiring special handling like asbestos

What's Included:

lists.comapreHeading: What Can Go in a 12-Yard Dumpster?
allowedItems: Framing lumber, drywall sheets, and moderate amounts of roofing materials
Yard waste and small tree trimmings
prohibitedItems: Paints, solvents, and other hazardous liquids
Tires and certain electronics (check local rules)
Large appliances with refrigerant (without prior scheduling)
Massive concrete, rock, or dirt loads unless approved

lists.seoContent:
15-Yard Dumpster Rentals in Lubbock, TX

Our 15-yard roll-off dumpsters are a great fit for homeowners and contractors needing extra capacity without moving up to full-size commercial containers. We provide on-time delivery and compliant disposal across Lubbock. Contact Dumpster Rentals Lubbock at [phone] for rates and scheduling.
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Accepted:

What's Included:

rightSection.description: A roll-off dumpster can handle large or small projects and is more versatile than you might think. Use our size guide to select the dumpster serving your area or request a quote and consultation.

lists.comapreHeading: What Can Go in a 15-Yard Dumpster?
allowedItems: Moderate amounts of roofing shingles and underlayment
Yard debris including small tree limbs
prohibitedItems: Paints, solvents, or other hazardous liquids
Large appliances with refrigerant (unless scheduled and permitted)

idealProjects: Major room or small whole-house renovations
